subject: feat(portfolio): add attribution showing this app is proof of skills
body:
Three-layer approach to make it clear the site itself is a portfolio piece:
- Header subline: "a hand-coded portfolio â€” built from scratch, not from a template"
- PortfolioCallout component between Hero and About with GitHub link
- Footer "Designed & built by" line with source code link
- Self-referential project entry in the Projects section listing the tech stack
